actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To make the repeal of the estate tax permanent.

summary.text: Death Tax Permanency Act of 2003 - Amends title IX (Compliance with Congressional Budget Act) of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 (P.L. 107-16) to repeal the sunset provisions applicable to title V (Estate, Gift, and Generation-Skipping Transfer Taxes) of such Act. (Makes estate tax repeal permanent.)States that such amendments shall take effect as if included in section 901 of such Act.

titles.title: To make the repeal of the estate tax permanent.
